QuestData.Title: Wake of Ashes
QuestData.Description:
It feels as if the Maw itself is sentient... and taking notice of our presence.
We must leave at once. Bolvar must be informed of what is happening here.
I will bring my father with us. Lead the way out of here, $n. With haste.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escape from the Maw and report to Bolvar in Oribos.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText: Now to get you and your... associates out of here.
